name: epigraphic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to words that are written on or cut into a hard material such as clay or stone, or to the study of these: epigraphic evidence This is the earliest epigraphic evidence that the cult existed.epigraphic data Is this hypothesis supported by the epigraphic data?epigraphic research A number of approaches were used in our epigraphic research.epigraphic source Textual and epigraphical sources tell us about the traders who operated there. Related word
epigraphy
More examplesFewer examplesThese epigraphic inscriptions were discovered in Ethiopia.He presented a detailed epigraphic analysis of the inscriptions at the conference.This paper will investigate archeological and epigraphical evidence for rivalries among small cities of the region.
